summary: The Canton of Zug is one of the 26 cantons of Switzerland.
full_text: The Canton of Zug  is one of the 26 cantons of Switzerland. It is located in central Switzerland and its capital is Zug. At 239 km2 the canton is one of the smallest of the cantons in terms of area. It is not subdivided into districts. It is the economic centre of Central Switzerland.
title: Zug (canton)
